authors.name: Mike Reynolds
authors.bio: Mike is a certified detailer with over 15 years of experience in the automotive industry. He specializes in paint correction and ceramic coating applications.

authors.name: Sarah Chen
authors.bio: Sarah is an automotive engineer who transitioned to professional detailing. She brings a scientific approach to vehicle care and specializes in ceramic coating technology.

authors.name: David Rodriguez
authors.bio: David owns a high-end detailing shop in California and has worked with luxury and exotic vehicles for over a decade. He's a specialist in ceramic coating applications.

authors.name: Lisa Thompson
authors.bio: Lisa is a content creator specializing in automotive care. She has collaborated with major ceramic coating brands and produces educational content for DIY enthusiasts.
